Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout.view.graphics

Class GoldenBrick

java.lang.Object
com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Brick
com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.CrackedBrick
com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.GoldenBrick
public class GoldenBrick extends CrackedBrick
Golden brick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class CrackedBrick, with full strength of 4.
Author:
Ning ZHU

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GoldenBrick(BrickModel model, javafx.scene.Group group)
    The class constructor sets the model and the view container of the golden brick, binds the layout of the view of the golden brick with the model, adds the view to the container, specifies the number of effective impacts the golden brick can withstand and initializes the crack array of the golden brick by calling the constructor of super class.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GoldenBrick

      public GoldenBrick(BrickModel model, javafx.scene.Group group)
      The class constructor sets the model and the view container of the golden brick, binds the layout of the view of the golden brick with the model, adds the view to the container, specifies the number of effective impacts the golden brick can withstand and initializes the crack array of the golden brick by calling the constructor of super class.
      Parameters:
      model - the model of golden brick
      group - the container of golden brick's view and crack's view
      See Also:
      • CrackedBrick(BrickModel, int, Group)
